description: Yuri Dmitriyev was convicted of the abusing his adopted daughter, an accusation he denies.
title: Yuri Dmitriyev: Russian historian's sex abuse sentence increased
title_page: Yuri Dmitriyev: Russian historian's sex abuse sentence increased - BBC News
maintext: In May, more than 150 Russians, including artists, actors and writers wrote an open letter to the court in support of the historian, saying they were "sure the accusations¡­ are unfair and should be dismissed by the court".
